description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER dated 3/6/13 that the report is adopted in part and set aside in part  and the Petition is denied. The Court's December 9, 2011 order enjoining the children from leaving the State of New York is vacated. The Clerk of the Court is directed to close the case. ( Ordered by Judge Sterling Johnson, Jr on 3/6/2013 )  (Guzzi, Roseann)
